note.p: Barrister. Student at East India College, Great Amwell, Hertfordshire, 1851. Retired from the East India Company Civil Service by 1861. Called to the bar, 1862. Elected to the Athenaeum Club, 1870; a member of the Committee.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1705/137/52), 1861 (RG9/627/45/5), 1871 (RG10/1121/51/10)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 June 2016)
